tool_config.name: Send-Message-To-Cinema
tool_config.description: Send a message from the caller to O Cinema staff via email. Use this when the caller wants to leave a message, ask a question that requires staff follow-up, inquire about group bookings, private screenings, or anything that needs human attention from the theater.

request_body_schema.description: Information about the message to send to O Cinema staff

properties.description: The actual message content from the caller. This is what the caller wants to tell O Cinema staff.
The name of the person calling, if provided. Ask the caller for their name before sending the message.
The caller's phone number if they want to be contacted back. Format as provided by caller (e.g., '(305) 555-1234' or '305-555-1234').

Brief context about what the caller was asking about before leaving the message (e.g., 'Inquiring about The Substance showtimes', 'Asking about weekend shows'). This helps staff understand the conversation context.
